plot

Source: R/plot.fG_simfit.R
plot.fG_simfit.Rd

visualize tracks simulated from a foieGras model fit

# S3 method for fG_simfit
plot(
  x,
  type = c("lines", "points", "both"),
  zoom = FALSE,
  or = NULL,
  ncol = 1,
  pal = "Viridis",
  ...
)

Arguments

x

a foieGras simulation data.frame with class fG_simfit

type

plots tracks as "line", "points" or "both" (default).

zoom

logical; should map extent be defined by track extent (TRUE) or should global map be drawn (FALSE; default).

or

orientation of projected map, default is to centre on start of fitted track (ignored if mapproj package is not installed).

ncol

number of columns to arrange multiple plots

pal

hcl.colors palette to use (default: "Viridis"; type hcl.pals() for options)

...

additional arguments to be ignored

Value

Plots of simulated tracks.

Examples

fit <- fit_ssm(sese1, vmax = 4, model = "crw", time.step = 72)
#> fitting crw...
#> 
 pars:   0 0 0 0      
 pars:   -0.08614 -0.6572 -0.7487 0.01093      
 pars:   0.59213 -0.31158 -1.232 0.44326      
 pars:   0.11659 -0.5539 -0.89315 0.14015      
 pars:   0.24115 -0.7847 -0.79254 0.24228      
 pars:   0.43252 -0.63624 -0.89367 0.38527      
 pars:   0.51713 -0.75421 -0.88914 0.6465      
 pars:   0.57726 -0.70556 -0.91113 0.52054      
 pars:   0.57726 -0.70556 -0.91113 0.52054      
trs <- simfit(fit, what = "p", reps = 2)
plot(trs, type = "b")
